name: Spirit Line
description:
Can you get to the port? Spirit line is a fun arcade game where you need to concentrate carefully to reach the top without hitting the obstacles flying your way!

With over 100 levels, testing your nerves!

How to play:

Tap to fire the spirit, avoid all the spirits and go to the port.

Features:
- 100 crazy levels
- The unique teleports.
- Intuitive and easy controls.
- Simple and beautiful graphics.
- Nice music.
